content.description: Techy and sketchy is the name of this game. Using mostly crimps you head toward the whiteish hueco at the top of the face where your best holds to top out are.
content.location: Stand start in middle of slab and head up in left to top out.

content.description: Stand start at the crack on the right/east side of the slab. Direct topout using seam and higher holds.
content.location: Right/East side of slab. Walk down the west side.

content.description: Start in the middle of the boulder on nice crimp ledge and go directly up where holds start to disappear. Topout with the same top hold as Simulator Seam. Fun and commiting face
content.location: Right of Slip N'Slab, left of Simulator Seam. Stand start with crimp ledge as first hands.

content.description: A fifteen foot tall slab that faces south with nicely spaced holds. There is a horizontal boulder infront of the slab and the trail cuts in between the two leaving a small corridor for your pad. Watch for potential bikers/hikers. Rock quality is ok with the left being better than the right.
